Business Insights: DAU / MAU, usage frequency, platform mix

What This Measures: User scroll attempt when cursor/touch outside scrollable content
Business Insights: Quantify unintended scroll patterns; validate scroll‑lock decision
Implementation Notes: Trigger when user tries to scroll while pointer outside list bounds.

What This Measures: Time until the top of the coins list crosses 50 % of viewport
Business Insights: Detect if users struggle to reach balances; optimise list layout
Implementation Notes: Record time until wallet list scrolls halfway on first load.

Business Insights: Ensure data freshness; monitor failed or slow syncs
Implementation Notes: Send when price/metadata update completes at launch.
